pr_title: JENA-1881: Model API changes for RDF*

timeline.message: JENA-1881: Model API changes for RDF*

timeline.author: kinow

replies.bodyText:
Many of the javadoc comments are like that.  ("Answer" but "create")
Redid the commit : I've gone through the javadoc on all methods and tidied up.
replies.author: afs

replies.bodyText: Sorry, I had looked only at a couple comments available in the GitHub diff interface.
replies.author: kinow

replies.bodyText: No problem - usual balance between focused changes for the ticket addressed and a desire to sort out things in passing.
replies.author: afs

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/jena-core/src/main/java/org/apache/jena/rdf/model/ResourceFactory.java b/jena-core/src/main/java/org/apache/jena/rdf/model/ResourceFactory.java
index ce680cad49..bae817dbe4 100644
--- a/jena-core/src/main/java/org/apache/jena/rdf/model/ResourceFactory.java
+++ b/jena-core/src/main/java/org/apache/jena/rdf/model/ResourceFactory.java

@@ -93,7 +93,7 @@ public class ResourceFactory {
     }
     
     /** 
-     * create a new resource representing an RDF* triple term.
+     * Create a new resource representing an RDF* triple term.
      * @param statement
      * @return a new resource 
      */

timeline.bodyText: Uppercase create? (Other methods seem to start with upper case...)
timeline.author: kinow
